title: Red Face
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Cylindrical body with square section handle; painted around the sides a large stylized red face opposite handle, with row of smaller women's faces to one side, row of mostly men's faces to other; leaves painted alongtop inside edge of lip
name: Cup
